nodes.text: Hail Three was the callsign assigned to the third pilot of the New Republic's Hail Squadron. During the Galactic Civil War, Jaith Omir was designated this callsign during a battle with the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing over the planet Chadawa, but was killed when a barrage of high radiation levels from high-tide interfered and detonated the proton torpedoes on his Y-wing.
Hail Three first appeared in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
